code:
import{CART_ADD_ITEM,CART_REMOVE_ITEM,CART_SAVE_SHIPPING_ADDRESS,CART_SAVE_PAYMENT_METHOD,CART_CLEAR_ITEMS}from'../constants/cartConstants';export const cartReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{cartItems:[],shippingAddress:{}};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case CART_ADD_ITEM:// Get item from the payload
const item=action.payload;// Assign existItem to item.product if their prpduct ids match
const existItem=state.cartItems.find(x=>x.product===item.product);// Check if item exists or Not
if(existItem){return{...state,cartItems:state.cartItems.map(x=>x.product===existItem.product?item:x)};}else{return{...state,cartItems:[...state.cartItems,item]};}case CART_REMOVE_ITEM:// Filter out cart item id that does NOT match with payload
return{...state,cartItems:state.cartItems.filter(x=>x.product!==action.payload)};case CART_SAVE_SHIPPING_ADDRESS:return{...state,shippingAddress:action.payload};case CART_SAVE_PAYMENT_METHOD:return{...state,paymentMethod:action.payload};case CART_CLEAR_ITEMS:return{...state,cartItems:[]};// In any other case, just return the state
default:return state;}};
